snippet.title: Overgrowth is now in BETA!
snippet.description:
Get Overgrowth early access at http://www.wolfire.com/purchase
Follow @wolfire at http://www.twitter.com/wolfire
Subscribe to http://www.reddit.com/r/overgrowth

Early access gives you:
- New fully re-imagined Lugaru campaign!
- Local multiplayer if you have a keyboard mouse and a controller, or 2 controllers
- All the editor tools used to make the game, and mods for the game
- All future Betas, and early access to new gameplay and content when it is available
- Access to the Secret Preorder Forum
- Easier access to mods using our SUMLauncher application
